New Records: Vladimir Guerrero Jr. passed George Bell in team history with the most total bases in a 42-game span of a season
Key Match Events: The Toronto Blue Jays lost a 10-9 slugfest against the Philadelphia Phillies on Tuesday night
Post-Match Reflections: Although the Blue Jays lost, Vladimir Guerrero Jr. continued his epic streak at the plate with a home run in the loss on Tuesday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blue Jays play the Phillies again on Wednesday afternoon at 3:07 p.m. ET
The looming offseason will be very interesting for both Guerrero Jr. and the Blue Jays
Others: The Toronto Blue Jays are in last place in the American League East with a 67-73 record
